column4: BRIEF-WNS Qtrly Diluted Earnings Per Ads Of $0.47
column6: * WNS ANNOUNCES FISCAL 2018 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR EARNINGS, PROVIDES GUIDANCE FOR FISCAL 2019
column7: * Q4 REVENUE $202.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $183.3 MILLION
column8: * FY 2019 ANI IS EXPECTED TO RANGE BETWEEN $115 MILLION AND $127 MILLION VERSUS $118.4 MILLION IN FISCAL 2018
column9: * SEES FY 19 ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER ADS TO BE IN THE RANGE OF $2.18 TO $2.41
column10: * FY 2019 REVENUE LESS REPAIR PAYMENTS IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $801 MILLION AND $847 MILLION, UP FROM $741.0 MILLION IN FISCAL 2018
column11: * “OUR GUIDANCE FOR YEAR REFLECTS GROWTH IN REVENUE LESS REPAIR PAYMENTS OF 8% TO 14%, OR 7% TO 13% ON A CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS”
column12: * FOR YEAR, EXPECT CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE APPROXIMATELY $30 MILLION
column13: * QTRLY ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER ADS OF $0.63 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
